programme.title: Gavrilo Princip kills Duke Franz Ferdinand
programme.short_synopsis: How Serbian Gavrilo Princip murdered Arch Duke Franz Ferdinand of Austro-Hungary.
programme.medium_synopsis: How Serbian Gavrilo Princip, the murderer of Arch Duke Franz Ferdinand of Austro-Hungary, destroyed the empire and instigated the First World War in one shot.
